projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: This microservice infrastructure is leverages Amazon Web Services (AWS), which allows us to deploy applications as microservices. In this architecture, I have multiple APIs hosted on separate servers, enabling dynamic scaling through Auto Scaling Groups. For improving the search functionality on the website, I leverage ElasticSearch. As for data storage, I rely on Amazon RDS for its efficiency and reliability. Additionally, I utilize SNS and SQS to facilitate to sending the notifications.

projects.title: CI/CD Automation
projects.description: The CI/CD architecture stands for Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. In this setup, GitHub Actions is utilized for pipelines, and the infrastructure is deployed on Amazon Web Services (AWS) using an auto-scaling group. This allows for the deployment of the latest version of the code, and the auto-scaling group ensures that new servers are created while old ones are deleted, as needed for deployment.
